Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Woodlawn
Woodlawn

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
- 2nd floor above Shoppers Drug Mart

- Negotiable rates

- Over 950 parking stalls within the plaza

- Windows overlooking residential neighbourhood

- Opportunity to build out space to desired requirements

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Woodlawn
Woodlawn

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
2nd floor of Shoppers Drug Mart anchored building. Located just off Main St with easy access to Hwy 111. Situated within a retail plaza with a strong mix of national tenants.

- High density/traffic corridor of Main St

- Ability to build to suit tenant’s needs

- Ample on-site parking

- Accessible second floor via elevator

- Competitive rates available

Burnside Business Park

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Large open concept office space has 4,225 Sf available with office furniture included. See flyer for more details!

Burnside Business Park, on Akerley and Morris Street
Burnside Business Park, on Akerley and Morris Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located in Burnside Business Park – largest Business Park east of Montreal. Conveniently located between Halifax International Airport and Downtown. Minutes from Hwy 111 and 118. Easy access from east or west side of the Park. Numerous amenities nearby. Ample on site parking at no charge. See Flyer for more information!
